dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: Build manual page from python's ArgumentParser object.
dependent_to.name: py-argparse-manpage

dependent_to.description:
Converts and organises raw MRI data-sets according to the Brain Imaging
Data Structure (BIDS).
dependent_to.name: py-bidscoin

dependent_to.description:
Black is the uncompromising Python code formatter. By using it, you
agree to cede control over minutiae of hand-formatting. In return, Black
gives you speed, determinism, and freedom from pycodestyle nagging about
formatting.
dependent_to.name: py-black

dependent_to.description: A simple, correct PEP517 package builder.
dependent_to.name: py-build

dependent_to.description: Testing coverage checker for python
dependent_to.name: py-coverage

dependent_to.description: A workflow engine for cycling systems.
dependent_to.name: py-cylc-flow

dependent_to.description:
The extension-helpers package includes convenience helpers to assist
with building Python packages with compiled C/Cython extensions. It is
developed by the Astropy project but is intended to be general and
usable by any Python package.
dependent_to.name: py-extension-helpers

dependent_to.description: Flit is a simple way to put Python packages and modules on PyPI.
dependent_to.name: py-flit

dependent_to.description: Distribution-building parts of Flit.
dependent_to.name: py-flit-core

dependent_to.description:
A PEP 518 build backend that uses setuptools_scm to generate a version
file from your version control system, then flit to build the package.
dependent_to.name: py-flit-scm

dependent_to.description: A list-like structure which implements collections.abc.MutableSequence.
dependent_to.name: py-frozenlist

dependent_to.description:
Gcovr provides a utility for managing the use of the GNU gcov utility
and generating summarized code coverage results. This command is
inspired by the Python coverage.py package, which provides a similar
utility for Python.
dependent_to.name: py-gcovr

dependent_to.description: Project to generate recipes for conda packages.
dependent_to.name: py-grayskull

dependent_to.description: Fancy PyPI READMEs with Hatch.
dependent_to.name: py-hatch-fancy-pypi-readme

dependent_to.description: Modern, extensible Python build backend.
dependent_to.name: py-hatchling

dependent_to.description: A small library that versions your Python projects.
dependent_to.name: py-incremental

dependent_to.description:
ipdb is the iPython debugger and has many additional features, including
a better interactive debugging experience via colorized output.
dependent_to.name: py-ipdb

dependent_to.description:
JupyterLab is the next-generation web-based user interface for Project
Jupyter.
dependent_to.name: py-jupyterlab

dependent_to.description: Library for managing ensemble-like collections of computations.
dependent_to.name: py-libensemble

dependent_to.description:
Build and publish crates with pyo3, rust-cpython and cffi bindings as
well as rust binaries as python packages.
dependent_to.name: py-maturin

dependent_to.description: A stand-alone XDRLIB module extracted from CPython 3.10.8
dependent_to.name: py-mda-xdrlib

dependent_to.description: Meson Python build backend (PEP 517).
dependent_to.name: py-meson-python

dependent_to.description: Optional static typing for Python.
dependent_to.name: py-mypy

dependent_to.description: Run any standard Python code quality tool on a Jupyter Notebook.
dependent_to.name: py-nbqa

dependent_to.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependent_to.name: py-numpy

dependent_to.description: Wrappers to build Python packages using PEP 517 hooks.
dependent_to.name: py-pep517

dependent_to.description: Python dependency management and packaging made easy.
dependent_to.name: py-poetry

dependent_to.description: Documentation generator for C++
dependent_to.name: py-poxy

dependent_to.description: Fast property caching
dependent_to.name: py-propcache

dependent_to.description: Python docstring style checker.
dependent_to.name: py-pydocstyle

dependent_to.description: python code static checker
dependent_to.name: py-pylint

dependent_to.description:
This project provides pylint formatters for a nice integration with
GitLab CI.
dependent_to.name: py-pylint-gitlab

dependent_to.description: Wrappers to call pyproject.toml-based build backend hooks.
dependent_to.name: py-pyproject-hooks

dependent_to.description: Parser for 'pyproject.toml'
dependent_to.name: py-pyproject-parser

dependent_to.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.
dependent_to.name: py-pytest

dependent_to.description:
Run pylint with pytest and have configurable rule types (i.e.
Convention, Warn, and Error) fail the build. You can also specify a
pylintrc file.
dependent_to.name: py-pytest-pylint

dependent_to.description:
A plugin for python-lsp-server that adds linting, code action and
formatting capabilities that are provided by ruff, an extremely fast
Python linter and formatter written in Rust.
dependent_to.name: py-python-lsp-ruff

dependent_to.description:
Scanpy is a scalable toolkit for analyzing single-cell gene expression
data built jointly with anndata.
dependent_to.name: py-scanpy

dependent_to.description:
scikit-build is an improved build system generator for CPython
C/C++/Fortran/Cython extensions. It provides better support for
additional compilers, build systems, cross compilation, and locating
dependencies and their associated build requirements. The scikit-build
package is fundamentally just glue between the setuptools Python module
and CMake.
dependent_to.name: py-scikit-build

dependent_to.description:
scikit-build-core is a doubly improved build system generator for
CPython C/C++/Fortran/Cython extensions. It features several
improvements over the classic scikit-build build system generator.
dependent_to.name: py-scikit-build-core

dependent_to.description: Setuptools rust extension plugin.
dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-rust

dependent_to.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.
dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-scm

dependent_to.description: A Python bindings generator for C/C++ libraries.
dependent_to.name: py-sip

dependent_to.description: Sphinx Documentation Generator.
dependent_to.name: py-sphinx

dependent_to.description: A tool for authoring Sphinx themes with a simple (opinionated) workflow.
dependent_to.name: py-sphinx-theme-builder

dependent_to.description:
Versioneer is a tool to automatically update version strings by asking
your version-control system about the current tree.
dependent_to.name: py-versioneer

dependent_to.description: Used for unpacking this author's obfuscated libraries
dependent_to.name: py-x21

dependent_to.description:
Volumetric Data Analysis yt is a python package for analyzing and
visualizing volumetric, multi-resolution data from astrophysical
simulations, radio telescopes, and a burgeoning interdisciplinary
community.
dependent_to.name: py-yt

dependent_to.description: QEMU is a generic and open source machine emulator and virtualizer.
dependent_to.name: qemu

dependent_to.description:
Workflow management system to create reproducible and scalable data
analyses.
dependent_to.name: snakemake

description:
Tomli is a Python library for parsing TOML. Tomli is fully compatible
with TOML v1.0.0.
name: py-tomli

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
